item.title: Aura: The Game
item.description: About — Aura # Aura is an in-development card game built from scratch using modern C++ and OpenGL. I’ve used this site to document the development process of the game engine. Github #

item.title: Card Game 02
item.description: Build Dependencies # CMake C++ (any compiler supporting 17 standard or higher) Building on Windows # Visual Studio 2019 Building # Cross-Platform Support #

item.title: Aura: The Game
item.description: About — Aura # Aura is an in-development card game built from scratch using modern C++ and OpenGL. I’ve used this site to document the development process. Github # Dependencies # CMake C++[17] Either MSVC or clang Cinder Library (with OpenGL)
